AddForm.Подзаголовок формы: Your channel will be added to the database at the next update
AddForm.Заголовок 1 вопроса: Which channels are accepted in the catalog?
AddForm.Подзаголовок 1 вопроса: The catalog accepts channels and groups that do not violate the rules of Telegram, with more than 100 subscribers.
AddForm.Заголовок 2 вопроса: How do I know that my channel has already been added?
AddForm.Подзаголовок 2 вопроса: To do this, use the site search, enter in the search bar the link to your channel that you specified when adding the channel to the catalog.
